allow: Bash(podman run --rm --entrypoint sh docxside-pdf-screenshot -c "grep -n ''Image or Canvas'' /app/node_modules/pdfjs-dist/legacy/build/pdf.mjs | head -5")

Bash(podman run --rm --entrypoint sh docxside-pdf-screenshot -c "grep -n ''Image or Canvas'' /app/node_modules/canvas/build/Release/*.node 2>/dev/null || grep -rn ''Image or Canvas'' /app/node_modules/canvas/lib/ 2>/dev/null | head -10")
Bash(podman run --rm --entrypoint sh docxside-pdf-screenshot -c "grep -rn ''Image or Canvas'' /app/node_modules/canvas/ 2>/dev/null | head -10")
